You can now create an interactive PowerPoint presentation for your audience by knowing from this video how to design a side menu using PowerPoint?!

So We will create a clickable side menu slide that you can press on the links to navigate through out the whole presentation in a creative way.

You will use the Kiosk mode in this PowerPoint presentation so that you can avoid move to undesired slide by mistake

Even you are a teacher or a student, you can now use this awesome interactive PowerPoint presentation to show off your data.

in PowerPoint channel and share this video with your friends who are interested in PowerPoint and technology.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Design a professional CV only in 20 minutes using PowerPoint

Resume is the most important factor when you try to apply for your dream job.

What about designing your cv in minutes with an awesome design using PowerPoint?!

In This Video is will make a PowerPoint tutorial to explain a step by step, How to make your own CV!
Get now your cv PowerPoint!
If you like this video please share it with your friends and subscribe to the channel.
